content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: VISITNUM
      operator: is_contained_by
      value: $tv_visitnum
    - name: VISIT
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: VISITNUM
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0035
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when VISITNUM is present in TV.VISITNUM and does not have
  a one-to-one relationship with VISIT
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $tv_visitnum
    name: VISITNUM
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: VISIT and VISITNUM do not have a one-to-one relationship
  Output Variables:
    - VISITNUM
    - VISIT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0035
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: There should be a one-to-one relationship between
                  values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.4.5
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0035
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: There should be a one-to-one relationship between
                  values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
                Document: IG v3.3
                Section: 4.4.5
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0035
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: There should be a one-to-one relationship between
                  values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
                Document: IG v3.2
                Section: 4.1.4.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when VISITNUM is present in TV.VISITNUM and does not have a one-to-one relationship with VISIT

Outcome.Message: VISIT and VISITNUM do not have a one-to-one relationship

Citations.Cited_Guidance: There should be a one-to-one relationship between values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
There should be a one-to-one relationship between values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
There should be a one-to-one relationship between values of VISIT and VISITNUM.
